member.name: T:ConfigWithMap.ConfigWithMapModule
member.summary: “Managed Configurations” allow branding of ArcGIS Pro meaning you can customize the splash and startup screens, application icon, and modify the runtime ArcGIS Pro User Interface to best fit your user’s business needs. This sample illustrates a configuration solution that includes those features.
member.remarks: 1. Download the Community Sample data (see under the 'Resources' section for downloading sample data). The sample data contains a folder called 'C:\Data\Configurations\Projects' with sample data required for this solution. Make sure that the Sample data is unzipped in c:\data and "C:\Data\Configurations\Projects" is available. 1. In Visual Studio click the Build menu. Then select Build Solution. 1. Click Start button to debug ArcGIS Pro. 1. ArcGIS Pro displays the custom splash screen. ![UI](Screenshots/ManagedConfigSplash.png) 1. Pro will then display the startup screen showing a map, click on the county of San Diego area on the map. ![UI](Screenshots/ManagedConfigStartup.png) 1. Pro will then open the San Diego project specifically tuned for this sample workflow. 1. Click on the 'Select Power Line Support' button to start a geoprocessing task that find all power line support structure further than 50 meters from the service road. 1. Click the 'Show Sites' button to show the geo processing task results. 1. Click the 'Edit' button to display the 'Edit' tab which contains existing ArcGIS Pro edit functionality. ![UI](Screenshots/ManagedConfigRunning.png)

member.name: P:ConfigWithMap.ConfigWithMapModule.Current
member.summary: Retrieve the singleton instance to this module here

member.name: M:ConfigWithMap.ConfigWithMapModule.CanUnload
member.summary: Called by Framework when ArcGIS Pro is closing
member.returns: False to prevent Pro from closing, otherwise True

member.name: P:ConfigWithMap.ConfigurationManagerWithMap.ApplicationName
member.summary: Replaces the default ArcGIS Pro application name

member.name: P:ConfigWithMap.ConfigurationManagerWithMap.Icon
member.summary: Replaces the ArcGIS Pro Main window icon.

member.name: M:ConfigWithMap.ConfigurationManagerWithMap.OnShowStartPage
member.summary: Called before ArcGIS Pro starts up. Replaces the default Pro start-up page (Optional)
member.returns: Implemented UserControl with start-up page functionality. Return null if a custom start-up page is not needed. Default ArcGIS Pro start-up page will be displayed.

member.name: M:ConfigWithMap.ConfigurationManagerWithMap.OnShowSplashScreen
member.summary: Called while ArcGIS Pro starts up. Replaces the default Pro splash screen. (Optional)
member.returns: Implemented Window with splash screen functionality. Return null if a custom splash screen is not needed. Default ArcGIS Pro splash screen will be displayed.

member.name: M:ConfigWithMap.ConfigurationManagerWithMap.OnShowAboutPage
member.summary: Customized UserControl is displayed in ArcGIS Pro About property page. Allows to add information about this specific managed configuration.
member.returns: Implemented UserControl with about box information. Return null if a custom about box is not needed. Default ArcGIS Pro About box will be displayed.
